## createBurnXudtTransaction() function

Creates an unsigned transaction for burning xUDT assets.

This function constructs a transaction that burns a specified amount of xUDT tokens from a given CKB address. It fetches the necessary cells, collects inputs, and constructs the transaction outputs accordingly.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function createBurnXudtTransaction({ xudtType, burnAmount, ckbAddress, collector, isMainnet, }: CreateBurnXudtTransactionParams): Promise<CKBComponents.RawTransactionToSign>;
```
